pylayers.antprop.slab.Slab.losst¶

Slab.losst(fGHz, theta)[source]¶

Calculate loss for theta=th at frequency (f)

Parameters :

fGHz : np.array()

frequency (GHz)

th : float

theta angle
Returns :

Lo : np.array

Loss orthogonal

Lp : np.array

Loss paralell
